alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 04 at 3:06PM MDT until September 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE AND CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 305 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ellsworth Air Force Base and Rapid City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Rapid City, northern Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Summerset, Black Hawk, and Piedmont. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 46 and 52, and between Mile Markers 61 and 65. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
